### Government Tender Announcement: Batch Oven

**Call Number and Classification**
* Title: Batch Oven
* G.S.I.N: *N4430 - Industrial Furnaces, Kilns, Lehrs, and Ovens*
* Tender Number: W355B-229791/B
* Solicitation Number: PW-_HAL-412-11582
* Amendment Date: 12 October 2022

**Tender Description**
Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites Proposers to submit bids for a Batch Oven on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND).

**Business Classification**
Business Session: RFP - RFQ (Request for Proposal/ Request for Quotation)
Tendering Procedures: Bid Invitation Procedure 2003
Tenure: Term of work

### Tender Requirements

PWGSC and DND require an industrial Class A oven for drying and curing equipment in the Heavy Electric Shop at the Fleet Maintenance Facility - Cape Scott (FMFCS). The oven must conform to NFPA 86 (2019) and CSA electrical standards. Delivery, installation, and commissioning of the oven are required.

DND may also require the option to purchase one additional unit within 12 months of the original oven's commissioning.

The successful Bidder must provide the requirements detailed in the Bid Solicitation Document, Annex A.

### Evaluation Criteria

The Evaluation of the Bids will be based on the lowest price.

### Conditions of Participation

* The Bidder must be able to deliver the oven on or before 30 September 2023.
* The Bidder must be able to demonstrate compliance with the tender requirements.

### Submission Information

Bids must be submitted in PDF format to CanadaBUsiness, using the Access Control Identifier (ACI) and Password provided.

### Inquiry and Clarification

All inquiries and clarifications must be submitted in writing by email to the Contracting Authority (Tara Sheppard), by no later than 7 days before the closing date of the bid.

Please contact Tara Sheppard at Tara.Sheppard@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca for further information.
